definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: How much is it for the whole day?
Please contact Concierge for details of Long Distance Car Hire.
sentences.chinese: 長途包車價格請向禮賓部查詢。

sentences.english: Three people were killed by shots fired at random from a minibus .
sentences.chinese: 3個人被從一輛麪包車中發射的亂彈打死了。

sentences.english: He spoke into the phone, "How about the buses with the adults?"
sentences.chinese: 他對着電話筒講到，“載有大人們的麪包車呢？”

sentences.english: South of Tecate, California, the van broke down.
sentences.chinese: 在加利福尼亞州的特卡特南邊，麪包車拋錨了。

sentences.english: Trip with other tourists:We rent a truck to get the destination. It is a good start.
sentences.chinese: 包車同行》和其他驢友結伴，一起包了輛貨車出發。

sentences.english: He earned only 3 silver dollar after pulling the rickshaw for a month.
sentences.chinese: 他辛辛苦苦拉一個月黃包車才賺3塊現大洋。

sentences.english: He is doing his passenger transport business and managing a hostel in Yubeng in Meili Snow Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 自己做着包車的生意，又在雨崩開了一家客棧。

sentences.english: Offer various middle- and low-grade cars and microbuses for citizen to rent.
sentences.chinese: 我公司備有各種中低檔轎車，麪包車，可供市民租用。

sentences.english: Boys who once pulled rickshaws now pedal pedicabs.
sentences.chinese: 曾經拉黃包車的男孩子們現在蹬三輪人力車了。

sentences.english: Rural libraries operate from trucks, mini-vans, boats …
sentences.chinese: 郊區圖書館在卡車，麪包車，船上。

sentences.english: See Yu Zhixin shot in the ground, woomi jumped to his rickshaw.
sentences.chinese: 看到餘志鑫中槍倒地，友美跳下黃包車奔向他。

sentences.english: Take the van to take the S-type winding road down to the port.
sentences.chinese: 坐上面包車走S型盤山公路下到口岸。

sentences.english: Torrijos stopped his van in front of our patio.
sentences.chinese: 托里霍斯讓麪包車在我們的平臺前停下來。

sentences.english: And in minutes, a van will come to your house and pick you up.
sentences.chinese: 只需幾分鐘，一輛麪包車就會開到你家來接你。

sentences.english: While crouching down trying to light a cigarette, a man drives by in a van.
sentences.chinese: 我低頭點菸時，有人開着一輛麪包車經過我身旁。

definition: to ride (in a vehicle)/to get a lift/to hitch-hike
Kenting, a national park on the southern tip of Taiwan, popular as a tourist destination (abbr. for 墾丁國家公園|垦丁国家公园[Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2])
travel time/expected time for a car journey
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
jointing machine/riveter/welder/sealer/to meet a plane (i.e. to meet sb at airport)/to service a plane (of airport workers)
Hualien, city and county on the east coast of Taiwan
to set off/to start (on a journey)
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
